title: An Act to establish to an industrial mill building task force

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Smola of Warren, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 308) of Todd M. Smola for legislation to establish an industrial mill building revitalization task force (including members of the General Court) to stimulate the re-development, rehabilitation and revitalization of industrial mill buildings and surrounding areas in the Commonwealth.  Community Development and Small Businesses.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Community Development and Small Businesses

related_entities.name: committee on Community Development and Small Businesses

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 07/15/2025 from 10:00 AM-01:00 PM in B-1
